summary: In 1940s Mississippi, two teenage boys and an elderly woman combine forces to prevent a miscarriage of justice and clear a black man of a murder charge.

Williams|E.H. Windham|George Winter|Howard Winters|Robert Lee Young
keywords: lynching|drool|drooling man|widower|throwing money on the ground
title: Han matado a un hombre blanco
